data.title: MARCH OF THE EMPIRE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
data.description:
The Latin Empire is on the march with the Second Bulgarian Tsardom.  They are about to do war with the Kingdom of France and the Duchy of  Burgundy.  Enjoy the battle :D

Jackie's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: MARCH OF THE BRAVE - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
data.description:

data.title: MASSIVE RUSSIAN ASSAULT - The Great War Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
This is my first upload of the Mod Great War Total War.  The mod takes place during World War 1.  In this scenario I command the Germans and We have to defend against a Russian assault, with limited supplies.  Will we hold? Enjoy :D

Mod: http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-great-war-mod

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: SLAUGHTER AT OSGILIATH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
8 mighty armies march to Osgiliath, but only 2 will be left standing!  Enjoy this epic 2v2v2v2 battle between some very powerful factions in Middle Earth.  The map is Osgiliath, and the mod is called third age total war!  Enjoy the battle :D

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/third-age-total-war

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: EPIC SIEGE OF OSGILIATH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
Faramir is holding Osgiliath against a massive army of orcs.  Recently Mordor has attacked and conquered East Osgiliath, and will be soon marching to West Osgiliath.  Faramir must hold, or the city of Minas Tirith will be under attack!  This is a historical battle during the War of the Ring.  Enjoy the battle :D 

scenario :- https://www.dropbox.com/s/k9awpb46fpf80ff/Assault_Osgilirathv2.rar?dl=0
rules.: 
1)if gothmog[1st orc leader] or witchking dies ..instant game win for gondor
2)the orcs must attack in waves...thus 0xp troops attack first...when they are depleted ..then the 1xp orcs attack and so...on ..[generals are excempt from this rule...]
3) the gondor troops outside the city cant move until the 1exp orcs on the western bank move
4)whilst 0exp orcs are attacking ,1xp orcs inside the city can move to the edge of the river[there side]...in preparation for assault[this can be done for 2xp when 1exp wave attacks etc..as long as they dont cross the river until the attacking wave is broken.]

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

-----------------------------------------PA Merchandise----------------------------------------------

Represent the Knight's of Apollo!
Buy a T-shirt Here: http://shop.spreadshirt.com/pixelatedapollo/

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Green Man Gaming Link:
http://www.greenmangaming.com/?tap_a=1964-996bbb&tap_s=29753-aa0a78

data.title: AZTEC INVASION - Medieval 2 Total War Gamplay
data.description:

data.title: SULTANATE AT WAR - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
data.description:
Thanks for joining me in another Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Battle.  Toady I will be taking on OverkillTW, he is commanding the Empire of Trebizond.  And I will be commanding the Sultanate of Rum!  Enjoy the Battle :D

Remember that the Mod Releases May 5th :D

Overkill's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHrnDapmaF4nnpVjEf4zOJQ

Find out more about the mod: twcenter.net/forums/forumdisplay.php?1767-Medieval-Kingdoms-Total-War-(MKTW)


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: EPIC HILL DEFENSE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
data.description:
Duchy of Burgundy is under attack by the Kingdoms England and her Polish allies.  They were not well prepared for the invasion, so they must take a defensive stand at a Roman Monument!  Can the fight off such large armies?  Enjoy the Battle :D

The map is called King of the Hill 2.0 you can find on the steam workshop.

Warrior's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/1984warriorofsparta

data.title: BATTLE OF VERDUN - The Great War Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
The German Empire is preparing their brave soldiers to cross into no man's land to take out the French defense.  They are going to have to face chemical warfare, artillery, and machine guns in this bloody assault.  This is the Battle of Verdun and were are going to be right in the middle of it! Enjoy :D

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-great-war-mod

Alex's channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/therambler146 

Warrior's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/1984warriorofsparta

data.title: EPIC MEDIEVAL SIEGE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
data.description:
No Guts No Glory!  Welcome to another bloody siege in Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212 AD.  A medieval mod for Total War Attila.  I command the French and my ally is Hungary.  Defending the Castle is England and Lesser Poland.  Enjoy the Battle!

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/medieval-kingdoms-total-war-attila-version/downloads/medieval-kingdoms-total-war-first-public-build
